sources.title: Bos448557
sources.description: Title: Blast of Silence Summary: A hired killer from Cleveland has a job to do on a second-string mob boss in New York. But a special girl from his past, and a fat gun dealer with pet rats, each gets in his way. Directed by: Allen Baron Actors: Allen Baron, Molly McCarthy, Larry Tucker Production Company: Magla Productions Release Date: 17 August 1962 (Denmark) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 Having been 'away' for some time, professional killer Frankie Bono returns to New York to do another job: assassinate some mid-level mobster. Although intending to avoid unnecessary 'contact' while carefully stalking his victim, Bono is recognized by an old fellow from the orphanage, whose calm and unambitious citizen's life and happy marriage contrast heavily with Bono's solitary and haunted existence. Exhausted and distracted, Bono makes another mistake, but his contract is not one to back out of.

metadata.Plot: Having been 'away' for some time, professional killer Frankie Bono returns to New York to do another job: assassinate some mid-level mobster. Exhausted and distracted, Bono makes another mistake, but his contract is not one to back out of.
